result.purpose: Responsible for handling tracking functionality, including configuration, data structures, and service operations for tracking events and requests.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related functionalities into separate files for configuration, data models, and service logic.

pkg/tracking/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration settings for tracking functionality.

pkg/tracking/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for tracking events and requests.

pkg/tracking/tracking_svc.go.purpose: Provides a tracking service for handling tracking requests and events.
